pr_title: Consolidate persistence-related classes in one module

timeline.message: Consolidate persistence-related classes in one module
Consolidate persistence-related classes in one module

timeline.bodyText: Should any impl packages be exported?
timeline.author: radito3

replies.bodyText: They shouldn't be, but unfortunately we have to export this one, since it's used in the xsa-multiapps-controller project (see CredentialStoreConfigurationEntryQueryImpl).
replies.author: nictas

timeline.bodyText: Why is the core changelog deleted? Was it used somewhere?
timeline.author: radito3

replies.bodyText:
Because the Liquibase changes from the core module were moved to the persistence module. Now they're all in one place. Finally! \o/
Also, see the bean above this one. There's still a SpringLiquibase bean.
replies.author: nictas
